challenges.title: Q1: TCP Characteristic
challenges.description: Which of the following is a key characteristic of TCP?
examples:
Options:
 a) Connectionless and unreliable
 b) Connection-oriented and reliable
 c) Used only for streaming video
 d) Does not support port numbers

challenges.title: Q2: UDP Usage
challenges.description: UDP is preferred over TCP when:
examples:
Options:
 a) Reliability is more important than delay
 b) Applications can tolerate some loss but need low latency (e.g., live streaming)
 c) We need guaranteed in-order delivery
 d) We are transferring critical banking data

challenges.title: Q3: Well-known Port
challenges.description: Which protocol commonly uses TCP port 80?
examples:
Options:
 a) FTP
 b) SMTP
 c) HTTP
 d) DNS (query)

challenges.title: Q4: TCP Features
challenges.description: Which feature is NOT provided by UDP but is provided by TCP?
examples:
Options:
 a) Congestion control
 b) Checksum for error detection
 c) Multiplexing via ports
 d) Support for IPv4 and IPv6
